name: ai-visibility-platform
description: AI Visibility Platform - Production-ready monorepo with observability, security, and automation

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @ai-visibility/db build && pnpm --filter @ai-visibility/shared build && pnpm --filter @ai-visibility/parser build && pnpm --filter @ai-visibility/providers build && pnpm --filter @ai-visibility/optimizer build && pnpm --filter @ai-visibility/copilot build && pnpm --filter @ai-visibility/api build
scripts.docker:up: cd infra && docker-compose up -d || docker compose up -d
scripts.docker:down: cd infra && docker-compose down || docker compose down
scripts.docker:logs: cd infra && docker-compose logs -f || docker compose logs -f
